descriptionTitle: Most decentralised projects are managed through a governance model, where stakeholders participate in decision-making processes.
description: This form of governance aims to ensure that the decentralised project operates in a fair, secure, and transparent manner and that all stakeholders have a say in how the project is managed.
Governance Market Cap DETF tracks governance tokens on the Binance Smart Chain, weighted by the total global market cap, across all centralised and decentralised exchanges.
Governance Liquidity DETF tracks governance tokens on the Binance Smart Chain, weighted by the total liquidity available in the decentralised exchanges that Polybit aggregates.
Governance Equally Balanced DETF tracks governance tokens on the Binance Smart Chain, equally weighted by the total number of tokens in the DETF.
